verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Verse 1:
Salvation sounds a new beginning
As distant hearts begin believing
Redemption's bid is unrelenting
Your love goes on, Your love goes on

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Pre Chorus:
You carry us, carry us, when the world gives way
Cover us, cover us, with Your endless grace

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Chorus:
Your love is relentless, Your love is relentless
Your love is relentless, Your love is relentless

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Verse 2:
The time is up for chasing shadows
You gave the world a light to follow
A hope that shines beyond tomorrow
Your love goes on, Your love goes on

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Bridge:
Tearing through the veil of darkness, breaking every chain, You set us free
Fighting for the furthest heart, You gave Your life for all to see
